SummaryEnglish: Ever since the Dragons became a threat to the human race, hunters have been hunting them down for the rewards. But this is by no means an easy task. Only those able to transcend the limits of the human condition can stand up to the mighty winged creatures. Ragna, a relatively weak young man, teams up with Léonica, an exceptional hunter who has already eliminated more Dragons than anyone. Only, following a tragic event, Ragna finds himself alone, driven by an insatiable thirst for revenge. Desperate to face and crush his enemies, he decides to team up with Crimson, a dark being who shares the same motivations as him: to eliminate the dragon monarchs for good.

1.TitleEnglish: Special Program ~The Road to Absolute Strength~
1.SummaryEnglish: Laguna Crimson Special Program ~The Road to the Absolute Strong~ A special program "The Road to the Absolute Strong" that looks back on the first cour of the TV anime "Laguna Crimson" and anticipates the contents of the second cour starting on January 13, 2024 More information Program content The cast of this work, Chiaki Kobayashi, Ayumu Murase, Rina Hidaka, and Rio Tsuchiya, will talk about the charm of the anime "Ragna Crimson"! You can also see some of the latest videos of the second cour in the program. Please look forward to! performer Chiaki Kobayashi (Laguna), Ayumu Murase (Crimson), Rina Hidaka (Staria), Rio Tsuchiya (Hezera/Glare)

1.TitleEnglish: The Day the Reaper Was Born
1.SummaryEnglish: Death and fire haunt Ragna's dreams, and deep within his heart, he somehow knows they're omens. If he doesn't grow stronger, and soon, all that awaits him is lifelong regret.

2.SummaryEnglish: Temruogtaf must be stopped. But Ragna loses interest in the dragon and turns his attention to one of his maids. Thanks to his new old memories, he knows who she really is.

3.SummaryEnglish: Crimson is no hero. He will manipulate and use others if it furthers his goal, and that callousness is precisely what makes him a needed ally against dragons.

4.SummaryEnglish: Dragons have another weakness aside from sunlight and silverine: pride. But Ultimatia is not like other dragons.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ragna met Ultimatia before in another life and he did not emerge from that encounter unscathed. Now, in this life, dragons are disappearing and Ultimatia needs to know why.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ultimatia may have control over time itself, but Crimson knows her powers must have a weakness. Uncover it, and all variables will be accounted for. Or so Crimson thinks.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ragna’s relentless assault forces Ultimatia on the defensive. Unaware of his identity, an unexpected emotion overtakes the dragon monarch as their battle rages on: Fear.

8.SummaryEnglish: Ultimatia made an impossible choice and, with Nebulim out for their blood, Ragna and Crimson must now withdraw. However, they may have only exchanged one problem for another.

9.SummaryEnglish: Starlia's ability to see a person’s true nature puts Crimson at a disadvantage, but when Ragna suddenly appears, the princess sees something in him she’s never seen before.

10.SummaryEnglish: While Crimson uses Ragna as a bargaining chip to convince Starlia to accept their aid, Woltekamui vows to remain at Ultimatia’s side and gives her much needed encouragement.

11.SummaryEnglish: Ragna spars with the Argentum Corps and infuses their weapons while Crimson assists with the teleportation circles. But they are not the only ones preparing for battle.

12.SummaryEnglish: The battle begins at sunset, but before they confront an uncertain fate, Starlia asks Ragna to listen to a heartfelt request.

13.SummaryEnglish: The battle has begun, but Ragna and the Argentum Corps are not facing just any enemy. They are facing those who mean to exterminate them by any means necessary.

14.SummaryEnglish: Olto Zora's cunning plan overwhelms the corps as they face the power of mature dragons. However, Crimson's impending offensive and Starlia's resolve may be the key to victory.

15.SummaryEnglish: The tide is turning as the corps claw their way through the battlefield—Ragna and Starlia the source of their inspiration. But none are aware of Crimson's callous scheme.

16.SummaryEnglish: Olto Zora used to be someone else once, and Starlia reminds him of someone he knew long ago.

17.SummaryEnglish: Olto Zora and Taratectra are lifelong friends who stand at a crossroads that could determine the battle. Now, Ragna and Starlia may be the only ones who can prevent calamity.

18.TitleEnglish: End of the Battle to the Death
18.SummaryEnglish: The battle is over, but at a heavy price. While a weary corps mourn their losses, representatives from the Solarian Church arrive to meet the fabled Reaper.

19.SummaryEnglish: Ragna has found a reason to fight, and he and the Argentum Corps will take the battle to the Blood of the Wing, no matter what Crimson thinks.

20.SummaryEnglish: Four superior dragons stand between them and the Winged Monarch. With unyielding resolve, the Argentum Corps storm a dead capital for the final battle.

21.SummaryEnglish: Multiple battles erupt in an all-out war against the Blood of the Wing. As each side engages in mortal combat, a crucial decision awaits Crimson.

22.SummaryEnglish: The darkest hour is at hand. As cherished comrades fall on both sides, bittersweet memories of the past surge to the forefront.

23.SummaryEnglish: As Ragna and Woltekamui's titanic battle rages across the heavens, the dragon is reminded of another encounter—one that shaped him into the warrior he is today.

24.SummaryEnglish: Just as Ragna, Crimson and the Argentum Corps stand at the cusp of victory, the worst case scenario occurs: Against all odds, Ultimatia reclaims her dominion over time.
